title: Public Holidays (Declaration) (No. 2) Notice, 2018
content:
SupplementtotheRepublicofZambiaGovernment 629
Gazettedated Monday,23rdJuly,2018
GOVERNMENTOFZAMBIA
STATUTORYINSTRUMENTNO.55OF 2018
ThePublicHolidays Act
(Laws,Volume15Cap.272)
ThePublicHolidays(Declaration)(No.2)Notice,2018
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection3ofPublicHoli-
daysAct,thefollowingNoticeisissued:
1. ThisNoticemaybecitedasthePublicHolidays(Declaration) Title
(No.2)Notice,2018.
2. It is declared that Thursday, 26th July, 2018, shall be Declaration
observed as Public Holiday due to the Mayoral and Ward by- of Public
Holiday
electionsthatwilltakeplaceonthatdate
EDGARC.LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
23rdJuly,2018
[CO/101/9/1]
CopiesofthisStatutory Instrumentcan be obtained from the GovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101 Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
630 StatutoryInstruments 23rdJuly,2018
